column3: I want a future where my children feel safe and appreciated and proud to be who they are. My heart is one with all the Arab Spring heroes, no matter how small they think their role is. I know they believe, like me, that we are working for a world whereby an Arab can live with the other in a respectful and dignified way.

If photographers are responsible for creating or reflecting an image of women in society, then, I must say, there is only one way for the future, and this is to define women as strong and independent. This should be the responsibility of photographers today: to free women, and finally everyone, from the terror of youth and perfection.
Any purchase is one for the future. If you buy a refrigerator, you are making a commitment to the future so that you have food to eat for the next ten years.
Young men, trust God, and make the future bright with blessing. Old men, trust God, and magnify him for all the mercies of the past.
Whoever uplifts civilization is rich though he die penniless, and future generations will erect his monument.

If you're not looking toward the future or trying to improve the current technology, you'll be left behind.

The future is made of the same stuff as the present.

The wise man must remember that while he is a descendant of the past, he is a parent of the future.
If humanity doesn't land on Mars in my lifetime, I would be very disappointed.
